name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Adventures
description:
RollerCoaster Tycoon®Adventures brings the legendary RollerCoaster
Tycoon®series into the next generation - combining classic RCT gameplay
with the modernized user experience of the critically acclaimed mobile
title RollerCoaster Tycoon®Touch™, all customized for the unique
features of Nintendo Switch™. Build your entertainment empire in three
distinct game modes – classic Campaign, tricky Scenarios, and the open
Sandbox. Over 200 wonderfully wacky rides, restaurants, shops and
decorations ensure parks burst with action, and the intuitive coaster
builder lets you create wild, death-defying coasters with ease. Play it
on your TV or on-the-go – it’s never been so easy to become a
RollerCoaster Tycoon!
